contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting me. I will get back to you soon.

0.title: Java Enterprise & Microservices
0.desc: My core expertise lies in building robust, scalable backend systems using Java and the Spring Ecosystem. I specialize in designing RESTful APIs and Microservices architectures, ensuring high performance and security for enterprise-grade applications.

1.title: DevOps & Cloud Native
1.desc: I don't just write code; I ship it. I have hands-on experience with DevOps practices including Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, and CI/CD pipelines. I focus on automating workflows to ensure reliable and fast deployments.

2.title: Full Stack JavaScript (MERN)
2.desc: Versatility is my strength. Beyond Java, I master the JavaScript ecosystem. I build dynamic user interfaces with React.js and develop lightweight, non-blocking backends using Node.js and Express. This allows me to adapt to any technical stack required.

3.title: AI Integration (Spring AI)
3.desc: I am passionate about the future of tech. I integrate Artificial Intelligence into web solutions using Spring AI, bridging the gap between traditional software development and LLMs to create smart, data-driven applications.

4.title: Agile & Collaborative Workflow
4.desc: Trained in active pedagogy, I thrive in Agile/Scrum environments. I am proficient in using Jira for project management, participating in sprints, and collaborating effectively via Git/GitHub. I value clean code and continuous learning.

0.title: YouCode (UM6P)
0.detail: Intensive training based on active pedagogy (Simplon). Mastery of modern technologies (Spring Boot / Angular), Agile/Scrum methodology and completion of concrete projects.

1.title: Faculté des Sciences Semlalia
1.detail: Acquisition of fundamentals in computer science, mathematics and algorithmic logic. Validation of two years of higher education.

2.title: Lycée Akensous
2.detail: Mathematical Sciences option A. Acquisition of strong analytical and logical thinking.

0.title: YouCode (Academic Projects)
0.desc: Development of complex web applications. Team work, version management (Git/GitHub) and respect of deadlines.

1.title: Freelance & Self-learning
1.desc: Period dedicated to self-learning. Exploration of Web development basics, completion of technical challenges and strengthening of programming logic.
